Docs.summary: Gets and sets the text contained in the current instance.
Docs.value: A containing the text contained in the current instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public AppleAdditionalInfoBox (TagLib.Mpeg4.BoxHeader header, TagLib.File file, TagLib.Mpeg4.IsoHandlerBox handler);

Docs.param: A containing information about the new instance, including the position at which to read.
A to containing the box to read.
A to use as a handler for the new instance.
Docs.summary: Constructs and initializes a new instance of by reading the contents from a file.
This class provides access to AdditionalInfoBoxes used by Apple but not defined by ISO/IEC 14496-12.
